Smooth Scrolling¶

JavaScript¶

Plugins.fn.smoothscrolling(time)¶

Plays a scroll effect when a link is clicked. Should be applied to a link that points to an anchor.

Arguments:
  • time (number) – The duration of the animation.
Returns:

An object providing enable and disable functions.
